hudson.tasks.Shell.command:
# Login using vca-cli r13 onDemand vca login appstech@websterx.com --password ${VCA_PASSWORD} --instance '97453e02-e83c-4cae-bbe9-3f7ee6dd8401' vca vdc use --vdc DevOps-VDC
if [[ $(vca vapp list | cut -d'|' -f2 | grep vApp1) ]] then vca vapp delete -a vApp1 fi
if [[ $(vca vapp list | cut -d'|' -f2 | grep vApp2) ]] then vca vapp delete -a vApp2 fi
if [[ $(vca vapp list | cut -d'|' -f2 | grep vApp3) ]] then vca vapp delete -a vApp3 fi
if [[ $(vca vapp list | cut -d'|' -f2 | grep vApp4) ]] then vca vapp delete -a vApp4 fi
if [[ $(vca vapp list | cut -d'|' -f2 | grep vApp5) ]] then vca vapp delete -a vApp5 fi
echo "=> Removed demo Test Servers"
